ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Areas Of Blowing Snow then Mostly Cloudy
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Areas of blowing snow before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.
